original_text: Ruth picked up grains in Boaz's field until evening. Then she hit the grains with a stick so that the seeds came out. The grains of barley that she took home filled a large basket.
korean_text: 룻이 밭에서 저녁까지 줍고 그 주운 것을 떠니 보리가 한 에바쯤 되는지라

sentences.original_text: Ruth picked up grains in Boaz's field
Then she hit the grains with a stick
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 다음 그녀는 막대기로 곡물을 쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: so that the seeds came out
The grains of barley that she took home
